dcterms:creator: Liu, Xinghong
Liu, Bing
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 25,716 utterances annotated with scenarios, actions, and entities, covering multiple home assistant tasks, chit-chat, and robot commands. Split into 10 folds with 9960 training and 1076 test utterances per fold, including 64 intents and 54 entity types.
dcterms:title: NLU-Benchmark

dcterms:creator: Hemphill, Charles J.
Godfrey, John J.
Doddington, George R.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing transcripts of audio recordings of people making flight reservations, with 4,478 training, 500 development, and 893 test utterances, including 21 intents and 79 entities.
dcterms:title: ATIS

dcterms:creator: Coucke, Alice
Saade, Alaa
Ball, Adrien

Dureau, Joseph
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from the Snips personal voice assistant, containing 13,784 training and 700 test examples across 7 intents and 39 entities.
dcterms:title: SNIPS
